mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_address,user_tel,user_birth) values(#{user_id},#{user_pwd},#{user_name},#{user_address},#{user_tel},#{user_birth})
mapper.select: select count(*) from users where user_id = #{user_id}
select user_name from users where user_id=#{user_id} and user_password=#{user_pwd}

select u.user_id, u.user_password user_pwd, u.user_name, u.user_address, u.user_tel, u.user_birth, auth.authority from users u left outer join authorities auth on u.user_id = auth.user_id where u.user_id = #{user_id}
